svg.title: Fayaz — Developer. Thinker. Problem Solver.

g.text: Currently: 🚀 Experimenting with AI Code Generation • 🔧 WordPress Plugin Development • 📊 JavaScript Data Filtering • ⚡ Performance Optimization
